string.value: Talk to #b#p9250134##k about the Demoralizing Aliens Project proposed by OSSS.
You heard from #b#p9250134##k about the Demoralizing Aliens Project proposed by OSSS.
I see that you've been issued a Bing Machine-Alpha. The Bing Machine-Alpha can be continuously upgraded until it becomes #b<Visitor Equipment>#k.
But to do that, you'll have to collect a lot of medals. Besides getting missions from #b#p9250133##k, the OSSS will provide other ways for you to get medals.
Please listen as I explain it all.
Are you ready to hear the explanation?
To show you our appreciation for listening, we will issue you a medal. Use it to upgrade your suit.
For a more detailed explanation. Please talk to me again and ask about each subject.
